sections.heading: Mayor; election; term.Each city of the metropolitan class shall elect a mayor as provided in section 32-536 whose term of office shall coincide with the terms of city council members elected concurrently to the city council
sections.text: SourceLaws 1979, LB 329, ยง 10;Laws 2025, LB521, ยง 9.Operative Date: Septembe
